lead_paragraph: At 6-foot-1 and 172 pounds, Michael Stanley Galliher appeared healthy — until he dropped dead days after being transferred to a California prison from a state mental hospital.

headline.main: Coroner: California Inmate Had Signs of Starvation
headline.print_headline: Coroner: California Inmate Had Signs of Starvation

snippet: At 6-foot-1 and 172 pounds, Michael Stanley Galliher appeared healthy — until he dropped dead days after being transferred to a California prison from a state mental hospital.
